entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is being taken care of by his aunt and uncle.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who is trying to keep him hidden from the wizarding world.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is deflating like an old tire and seems to be losing his energy.

entities.name: howler
entities.description: A magical object that sends a loud, angry message to Harry.

relationships.description: Petunia is taking care of Harry and trying to keep him hidden from the wizarding world.
Uncle Vernon is married to Petunia.
